string-array.name: randremind_release_notes
string-array.item: Added option to clear reminder log.
Added list of notification sounds ability.
Added a link to sample reminders and icon packs on the jamesmorrisstudios website.
Added an option to show the reminder image in the notification.
Added Android Intent based plugin support for use with automation apps.
Added RSS feed support for messages.
Fixed a bug where auto snooze would not work with a location triggered reminder.

string-array.name: oneup_release_notes
string-array.item: Simplified the menu design by moving everything to a navigation drawer.
Changed the ad format to interstitial ads and removed banner ads.
Changed the ad provider so ads are mostly more gaming related.
